titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4426) making appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1995.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4426 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered except motion to recommit. Waiving all points of order against the bill and against its consideration. Measure will be read by section. Specified amendments are in order. After general debate, the pending question shall be the adoption of the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Appropriations now printed in the bill. The amendment shall be debatable for 10 minutes. All points of order against the amendment and against the bill, if amended, shall be waived. No further amendment to the bill shall be in order except as specified by the report accompanying this resolution, and debatable as specified. All points of order against said amendments shall be waived. The chairman of the Committee of the Whole may postpone a request for a recorded vote on any amendme...
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-530, by Mr. Hall (OH).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 169.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 191 (Roll no. 202).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 244 - 181 (Roll no. 203).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/25/1994--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4426 (making FY 1995 appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs).
